item.title: 7 Habits of an Effective Data Scientist
item.description: “What you do every day = who you are.” As an aspiring data scientist, I realized the importance of the habits that we do every day, both consciously and unconsciously. During that period of realization, I found one of the best self-mastery books — “The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People” by Stephen R. Covey. As the title suggests, the book elaborates on the 7 habits of the planet’s highly effective people.
